prompt: A futuristic room with a person wearing a virtual reality headset, surrounded by holographic screens displaying a timeline of video game evolution, from the simple graphics of Pong to advanced photorealistic 3D worlds, illustrating the concept of reality as an advanced simulation.

A retro scene depicting a vintage arcade setting with an old-school television displaying the classic game Pong, featuring two simple white rectangles on opposite sides of the screen and a small square dot moving between them, set against a colorful 1980s backdrop with other arcade machines and vibrant neon lights.

An image of a retro gaming setup featuring an old television screen displaying the classic game Pong, with its distinctive black background and simple white graphics consisting of two vertical rectangles representing paddles and a small square dot as the ball, accompanied by a vintage game console and joystick controller from the 1970s.
